alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 10:46AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, northwestern Broadwater and northeastern Jefferson Counties through 1130 AM MDT... At 1045 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Montana City, or 10 miles south of Helena, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena, East Helena, Montana City, York, Rimini, Alhambra, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Clancy and Goose Bay. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 179 and 198. Highway 12 between mile markers 31 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
